00025 RooRealVar* BdkDalitz::_m23VetoMass = 0;
00026 const Double_t BdkDalitz:: D0MASS  = 1.8646;
00027 const Double_t BdkDalitz:: PI0MASS = 0.1349766;
00028 const Double_t BdkDalitz:: PIMASS  = 0.13957;
00029 const Double_t BdkDalitz:: KMASS   = 0.493677;
00030 const Double_t BdkDalitz:: K0MASS  = 0.497648;
00031 const Double_t BdkDalitz:: ETAMASS  = 0.54751;

00056 
00060 void BdkDalitz::setDdecMode(BdkDalitz::Mode DdecMode)
00061 {
00062   _DdecMode = DdecMode;
00063   
00064   // D0 -> pi+ pi- pi0
00065   if (DdecMode==BdkDalitz::PPP0)       setMasses(D0MASS,PI0MASS,PIMASS,PIMASS);
00066   // D0 -> K+ pi- pi0
00067   else if (DdecMode==BdkDalitz::KPP0)  setMasses(D0MASS,PI0MASS,KMASS,PIMASS);
00068   // D0 -> K+ K- pi0
00069   else if (DdecMode==BdkDalitz::KKP0)  setMasses(D0MASS,PI0MASS,KMASS,KMASS);
00070   // D0 -> pi+ pi- Ks
00071   else if (DdecMode==BdkDalitz::PPK0)  setMasses(D0MASS,K0MASS,PIMASS,PIMASS);
00072   // D0 -> K+ K- Ks
00073   else if (DdecMode==BdkDalitz::KKK0)  setMasses(D0MASS,K0MASS,KMASS,KMASS);
00074   // D0 -> K- pi+ Ks
00075   else if (DdecMode==BdkDalitz::KPK0)  setMasses(D0MASS,K0MASS,PIMASS,KMASS);
00076   
00077   else                                 setMasses(-1,-1,-1,-1);
00078 }

00080 
00082 Double_t BdkDalitz::m13Max(Double_t m12, Double_t M, 
00083                                Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3)
00084 {
00085   if ((m12<sqr(m1+m2)) || (m12>sqr(M-m3))) return 0;
00086 
00087   // Energies of particles 1 and 3 in m12 restframe
00088   Double_t e1star = (m12 - m2*m2 + m1*m1) / (2.0*sqrt(m12));
00089   Double_t e3star = (M*M - m12 - m3*m3  ) / (2.0*sqrt(m12));
00090 
00091   return sqr(e1star+e3star)-sqr(sqrt(e1star*e1star-m1*m1)-sqrt(e3star*e3star - m3*m3));
00092 }
00093 
00095 Double_t BdkDalitz::m13Min(Double_t m12, Double_t M, 
00096                                Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3)
00097 {
00098   if ((m12<sqr(m1+m2)) || (m12>sqr(M-m3))) return 0;
00099 
00100   // Energies of particles 1 and 3 in m12 restframe
00101   Double_t e1star = (m12 - m2*m2 + m1*m1) / (2.0*sqrt(m12));
00102   Double_t e3star = (M*M - m12 - m3*m3  ) / (2.0*sqrt(m12));
00103 
00104   return sqr(e1star+e3star)-sqr(sqrt(e1star*e1star-m1*m1)+sqrt(e3star*e3star - m3*m3));
00105 }
00106 
00108 Double_t BdkDalitz::m12Max(Double_t m13, Double_t M, 
00109                                Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3)
00110 {
00111   if ((m13<sqr(m1+m3)) || (m13>sqr(M-m2))) return 0;
00112 
00113   // Energies of particles 1 and 2 in m13 restframe
00114   Double_t e1prime = (m13 - m3*m3 + m1*m1) / (2.0*sqrt(m13));
00115   Double_t e2prime = (M*M - m13 - m2*m2) / (2.0*sqrt(m13));
00116 
00117   return sqr(e1prime+e2prime)-sqr(sqrt(e1prime*e1prime-m1*m1)-sqrt(e2prime*e2prime - m2*m2));
00118 }
00119 
00121 Double_t BdkDalitz::m12Min(Double_t m13, Double_t M, 
00122                                Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3)
00123 {
00124   if ((m13<sqr(m1+m3)) || (m13>sqr(M-m2))) return 0;
00125 
00126   // Energies of particles 1 and 2 in m13 restframe
00127   Double_t e1prime = (m13 - m3*m3 + m1*m1) / (2.0*sqrt(m13));
00128   Double_t e2prime = (M*M - m13 - m2*m2) / (2.0*sqrt(m13));
00129 
00130   return sqr(e1prime+e2prime)-sqr(sqrt(e1prime*e1prime-m1*m1)+sqrt(e2prime*e2prime - m2*m2));
00131 }

00133 
00135 Bool_t BdkDalitz::inDalitzBounds(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, 
00136                                  Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3)
00137 { 
00138   // kinematic limits
00139   Double_t m13High = m13Max(m12,M,m1,m2,m3);
00140   if (m13High<=0) return kFALSE;
00141 
00142   Double_t m13Low = m13Min(m12,M,m1,m2,m3);
00143   if (m13Low<=0) return kFALSE; 
00144 
00145   // decide
00146   if ( (m13 < m13Low) || (m13 > m13High)) return kFALSE;
00147 
00148   return kTRUE;
00149 }
00150 
00154 Bool_t BdkDalitz::inDalitz(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, 
00155                            Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3)
00156 {
00157   if (inDalitzBounds(m12,m13,M,m1,m2,m3) &&
00158       !inM23Veto(m12,m13,M,m1,m2,m3)) return kTRUE;
00159   else return kFALSE;
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00164 Bool_t BdkDalitz::inM23Veto(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, 
00165                                 Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3)
00166 {
00167   if (!hasM23Veto()) return kFALSE;
00168 
00169   Double_t m23 = mOtherVal(m12, m13, M, m1, m2, m3);
00170   if (m23>m23VetoMin() && m23<m23VetoMax()) return kTRUE;
00171   else return kFALSE;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00178 Int_t BdkDalitz::findIntersection(const RooAbsFunc& func, 
00179                                   Double_t& m12Left, Double_t& m12Right) const
00180 {
00181   const Double_t dx = 0.001;   // step in m12
00182   const Double_t dy = 0.01;    // accuracy in m13
00183 
00184   Double_t max = m12MaxLimit();
00185   m12Left = -1;     // Default value indicating error
00186   m12Right = -1;
00187   
00188   // Loop for upper and lower Dality boundary
00189   for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
00190     Double_t m12 = m12MinLimit();    // start on left side of Dalitz plot  
00191     while (m12<=max) {
00192       Double_t y = (j==0 ? m13Max(m12) : m13Min(m12));   // upper or lower bound?
00193       if (abs(func(&m12)-y)<dy) {   // found intersection?
00194         if (m12Left<0) m12Left = m12;
00195         else m12Right = m12;
00196       }
00197       m12 += dx;
00198     }
00199   }
00200   /*
00201   if (_verboseEval) cout << "Intersections with Dalitz at: "
00202                          << m12Left << "," << func(&m12Left) << " and "
00203                          << m12Right << "," << func(&m12Right) << endl;
00204   */
00205   if (m12Left<0 && m12Right<0) return 0;
00206   else if (m12Left*m12Right<0) return 1;
00207   else return 2;
00208 }

00210 
00211 
00214 TGraph* BdkDalitz::drawBoundary(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3,
00215                                     Int_t points)
00216 {
00217   if (points<=0) return 0;
00218 
00219   TGraph *g = new TGraph(2*points);
00220   if (!g) return 0;
00221 
00222   Double_t x1 = m12MinLimit(M,m1,m2,m3);     // determine min and max of m12
00223   Double_t x2 = m12MaxLimit(M,m1,m2,m3);
00224   
00225   Double_t h = (x2-x1)/points;      // spacing between points
00226   Double_t x = x1;
00227   Double_t y = 0;
00228 
00229   // draw lower boundary
00230   for (Int_t i=0; i<points; i++) {         
00231     y = m13Min(x,M,m1,m2,m3);
00232     if (y>0) g->SetPoint(i,x,y);
00233     x += h;
00234   }
00235   
00236   // draw upper boundary
00237   x = x2;
00238   for (Int_t i=points; i<2*points; i++) {  
00239     y = m13Max(x,M,m1,m2,m3);
00240     if (y>0) g->SetPoint(i,x,y);
00241     x -= h;
00242   }
00243 
00244   // remove points with invalid coordindates
00245   for (Int_t i=0; i<2*points; i++) {
00246     g->GetPoint(i,x,y);
00247     if ((x<=0) || (y<=0)) g->RemovePoint(i);
00248   }
00249 
00250   // add one more point that closes the boundary
00251   g->Set(g->GetN()+1);
00252   g->GetPoint(0,x,y);
00253   g->SetPoint(g->GetN()-1,x,y);
00254 
00255   return g;
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00265 Bool_t BdkDalitz::weightBins(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3,
00266                              TH2* h, Bool_t weightContent, Double_t step)
00267 {
00268   if (!h) return kFALSE;
00269   if (h->GetDimension()!=2) return kFALSE;
00270 
00271   TAxis *ax = h->GetXaxis();
00272   TAxis *ay = h->GetYaxis();
00273   if (!ax || !ay) return kFALSE;
00274 
00275   Double_t integral = h->Integral();   // for normalization at the end
00276   // Loop over all bins
00277   for (Int_t i=ax->GetFirst(); i<=ax->GetLast(); i++) {
00278     for (Int_t j=ay->GetFirst(); j<=ay->GetLast(); j++) {
00279    
00280       // Coordinates of bin corners
00281       Double_t x1 = ax->GetBinLowEdge(i);
00282       Double_t x2 = ax->GetBinUpEdge(i);
00283       Double_t y1 = ay->GetBinLowEdge(j);
00284       Double_t y2 = ay->GetBinUpEdge(j);
00285 
00286       Int_t NinDalitz = 0;
00287       Int_t N = 0;
00288       for (Double_t x=x1; x<=x2; x+=step) {
00289         for (Double_t y=y1; y<=y2; y+=step) {
00290           N++;
00291           if (inDalitz(x,y,M,m1,m2,m3)) NinDalitz++;
00292         }
00293       }
00294       Double_t weight = (Double_t)NinDalitz/N*(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
00295 
00296       if (weightContent) {
00297         if (weight>0) {
00298           if (h->GetBinContent(i,j)==0)
00299             cout << "BdkDalitz::weightBins: WARNING: Bin ("
00300                  << i << "," << j << ") has no entries."<<endl;
00301           else h->SetBinContent(i,j,h->GetBinContent(i,j)/weight);
00302         }
00303         else h->SetBinContent(i,j,0);
00304       }
00305       else h->SetBinContent(i,j,weight);
00306     }  
00307   }
00308   // Normalize to the original integral
00309   if (weightContent) h->Scale(integral/h->Integral());
00310   return kTRUE;
00311 }
00312 
00313 
00317 Int_t BdkDalitz::inDalitzDataSet(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3,
00318                                  const RooAbsData& data, 
00319                                  const RooRealVar& m12, const RooRealVar& m13,
00320                                  Bool_t useVetoWindow, Bool_t verbose)
00321 {
00322   if (data.numEntries()==0) {
00323     if (verbose) cout << "BdkDalitz::inDalitzDataSet(): empty dataset."<<endl;
00324     return -1;
00325   }
00326   if (data.get(0)->find(m12.GetName())==0) {
00327     if (verbose) cout <<"BdkDalitz::inDalitzDataSet(): "
00328                       << m12.GetName() << " is not in dataset." << endl;
00329     return -1;
00330   }
00331   if (data.get(0)->find(m13.GetName())==0) {
00332     if (verbose) cout << "BdkDalitz::inDalitzDataSet(): "
00333                       << m13.GetName() << " is not in dataset." << endl;
00334     return -1;
00335   }
00336 
00337 
00338   Int_t outOfDalitz = 0;
00339 
00340   for (int i=0; i<data.numEntries(); i++) {
00341     const RooArgSet* vars = data.get(i);
00342     Double_t m12Val = ((RooRealVar*)vars->find(m12.GetName()))->getVal();
00343     Double_t m13Val = ((RooRealVar*)vars->find(m13.GetName()))->getVal();
00344     
00345     Bool_t b;
00346     if (useVetoWindow) b = inDalitz(m12Val, m13Val, M, m1, m2, m3);
00347     else b = inDalitzBounds(m12Val, m13Val, M, m1, m2, m3);
00348 
00349     if (!b) {
00350       if (verbose) cout <<"BdkDalitz::inDalitzDataSet(): m12 = " << m12Val
00351                         << " m13 = "<<m13Val<<" is outside of Dalitz boundary."
00352                         << endl;
00353       outOfDalitz++;
00354     }
00355   }
00356   return outOfDalitz;
00357 }
